entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
